====Bag Functions test====
{{Bag2|Lucky Incense|Lucky test ?}} <- Bag2 set the image link to the second argument, but seems like never used anywhere
{{Bag3|EXP Share|EXP test ?}} <- Bag3 doesn't show anything if second argument, just the picture
{{Bag4|Pokéball|Poké test ?}} <- Bag4 works perfectly
